comment: transferring L-allo-isoleucyl group from CmaA [KO:K15646] to CmaD [KO:K15648]
definition: L-allo-Isoleucyl-[peptidyl-carrier protein] + Peptidyl-carrier protein <=> Peptidyl-carrier protein + L-allo-Isoleucyl-[peptidyl-carrier protein]
name: L-allo-isoleucyl-[peptidyl-carrier protein]:[peptidyl-carrier protein] L-allo-isoleucyltransferase
